mapper.sql: ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, USERNAME, PASSWORD, ORIGIN, PHONE, IDCARDNUMBER, XM,AGENCYNAME,AGENCYCODE,ORIID
mapper.select:
select
from SYS_USER where scbj=0 and ORIID = #{oriid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and rownum=1 order by id desc

select
from SYS_USER where scbj=0 and IDCARDNUMBER = #{idcard,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and rownum=1 order by id desc
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_SYS_USER_ID.nextval from dual
insert into SYS_USER
ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, USERNAME,
PASSWORD,
ORIGIN,
PHONE,
IDCARDNUMBER, XM, AGENCYNAME, AGENCYCODE,ORIID
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 0, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{idcardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agencyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agencycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oriid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update SYS_USER
SCBJ = #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCARDNUMBER = #{idcardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XM = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENCYCODE = #{agencycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENCYNAME = #{agencyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
